approve_case.success: The case has been approved successfully.
approve_case.error: Error occurred while approving the case.

reject_case.success: The case has been rejected successfully.
reject_case.error: Error occurred while rejecting the case.

approve_document.success: The document has been approved successfully.
approve_document.error: Error occurred while approving the document.

reject_document.success: The document has been rejected successfully.
reject_document.error: Error occurred while rejecting the document.

ask_revision_document.success: The document has been asked for revision successfully.
ask_revision_document.error: Error occurred while asking for revision of the document.

revert_revision.success: Asking for document revision has been cancelled successfully.
revert_revision.error: Error occurred while reverting the document revision.

update_document_properties.success: The document has been updated successfully.
update_document_properties.error: Error occurred while updating the document.

assign_case.success: The case has been assigned to {{assignee}} successfully.
assign_case.error: Error occurred while assigning the case to {{assignee}}.

unassign_case.success: The case has been unassigned successfully.
unassign_case.error: Error occurred while unassigning the case.

ocr_document_error: Error occurred while performing OCR on the document.
